website_summaries.verdict: Froth milk effortlessly and without spending a lot of money.
pros: Produces a rich, creamy froth within seconds
Space-saving design that is also compact enough to become a permanent fixture on the counter
Sleek brushed silver with a matching stand
cons: Runs on 4 AA batteries, but they're not included

customer_reviews.title: Too Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! However, I dropped my first one that lasted well over 3 years. Purchased another 6 months ago and always have been gentle with it. Whipping up my coffee the bottom comes off in 2 pieces, the base that attaches to the wand and the flat corrugated blender. IMO its needs to be a spot weld or a better press together. The return period is over. I'm done. This was my last unfortunately because I really like it and the stand for your kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Two down, none to go. Won't trust BonJour again.
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the disc broke off of mine (normal use; foaming milk, not rubber cement or anything) before it was a month old. Took a pic, sent an e-mail to the company (BonJour) and was told they only warranty/guarantee their products to work when they come out of the box—nothing more. (Amazing, right? That's an impressive commitment to quality.) They "made an exception" for me, though, and sent me a replacement, which spins off-center about 50% of the time (noisier, less effective and bad for the motor/product). It does burn through batteries like a rock star, though, so there's that. So, no—do not recommend and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Stevens

customer_reviews.title: worked great a few times.
customer_reviews.text: likes - Clean design, convenient power button., nice stand (even if it looks like a giant corkscrew) dislikes- after about the third use, the propeller fell off. fishing it out of my coffee was annoying, ever tried stirring with a small drill bit? doesn't work. No worries being some what handy I re attached the propeller. good as new. Could have sent it back but I may have gotten the same problem with the next one. I'll see how it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: does not froth as good as the less expensive bonjour.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the $14.99 bonjour frother for 5 years. It worked great but finally broke when it fell on the floor. Bought this one for $19.99 thinking it would work even better but...it does not froth as well at all. Plus it uses 4 batteries instead of 2. And 4 batteries make it heavier so it tips over even easier it its stand. Dont waste your money! Get the cheaper Bonjour.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Torreano

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped
customer_reviews.text: I loved this...until it stopped working. Bought it in June and it was awesome - blended and frothed great! Then it just stopped working. I tried changing the batteries out and nothing. Only 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D

customer_reviews.title: need better info on how to put in batteries
customer_reviews.text: so disappointed. bought one for work and loved it. bought second and didn't work. returned and got another one the same problem. then realized that 2 batteries had to go one way and other 2 the other way. please label this better. It was not on the second and third ones. the first one, my coworker put together and had the right labels on each side. I discovered this last week! I would have loved to have the same at home and likely that was the issue on the second and third ones bought and returned. I had no idea. bummed as I would have like it at home....
customer_reviews.author: naesllewop

customer_reviews.title: Want a GREAT frother... look no further!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this frother. I had one of these several years ago and it lasted a long time. But when I needed to replace it I could not find it and purchased another brand. This brand is MUCH better and lasts MUCH longer. The little spinner that makes the beverage frothe is like a cutter and not a wire ring. The cutter is MUCH more effective. Packaging was great and protected the product. And I received it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: livelikeno2morrow

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart, that's why Lotioncrafter discontinued them. But I just wanted to see for myself.
customer_reviews.text: Fall apart. The blade fell off on my first mix with water! To bad because it has so much power. I didn't send it back because I plan in soldering it back on myself.
customer_reviews.author: LADYKAT

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2  months
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mixer...at first. I used it for making bath and body products. But it died after 2 months, in the middle of making a recipe no less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this mixer.
customer_reviews.text: Most poorly executed hunk of scrap available. The power switch is intermittent, even if you have Hulk thumbs. It finally died completely today. In the off circumstance it actually worked, it had a nice powerful motor thanks to 4 AA batteries. I wish someone made a decent 4 AA hand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Jon J

customer_reviews.title: Defective and looks used
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and looked used (scratches on handle) and then didn’t work after I put new batteries in it. Disappointing for sure! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Item received does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: We have used this frother model for twenty years and had three separate units. I dropped the last one and caused the shaft & blade to somehow become out of balance. It vibrated and did not stir well. I reordered the exact same model and when it arrived it had nearly same vibration and does not froth. We are ordering a second frother while working on returning the defective one. Sure hope this is not the new normal......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is way toooo powerful. I was looking for a mini frother to do my creamer in my coffee. Very disappointed as it stated mini frother.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Mickle

customer_reviews.title: Turn on button uncomfortable to keep on. Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous to keep on the button on top, what is in mind of someone to built a item which you have to keep your finger pressed to keep it on? Plus is a bard button to keep in and very uncomfortable, returned ed a day after.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Campos

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Expensive and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Used it once after struggling to turn it on. It broke the very first use. Returned it the very next day. Don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Spins at a pretty low speed and pretty disappointing once you immerse in ...
customer_reviews.text: Spins at a pretty low speed and pretty disappointing once you immerse in your drink (it slows even more). The spinning component actually wobbles about while spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Dan+Em

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but the previous one died in couple years..
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite frother, we were looking for it for a long time, after the previous one died.. It worked for couple years, then just suddenly stopped - changing batteries didn't help. It makes great foam for our coffee. Very powerful! The stand is a bit flimsy, keep falling down and batteries would just pop out and scatter all over the counter! It looks very slick, I just wish it was more durable..
customer_reviews.author: OlgaB

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the item for six months and the disk has broken off. Not worth the money. Very disappointed because It replaced a Bon Jour frother that lasted years.
customer_reviews.author: Gandhicat

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I got a bad one. You have to squeeze like hell to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these because they are more powerful than the Aerolatte. Unfortunately I got a bad one. You have to squeeze like hell to get the button to work and half of the time it rattles around in the casing and hardly spins. Normally I would return something that doesn't work well but for $20.00 I figured I would be less persnickety than usual and just try to deal with it. Bad decision. So, yes, I would recommend this product normally but this particular one was no good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product was damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: The push button did not move. It was jammed and could not be released; therefore I was unable to use it.the product was damaged on arrival. I need to return it if I could have given the product zero stars, I would have done so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The button is difficult to push and hold, making it difficult to hold and froth.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Add some serious froth to your coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic frother! Take your average cup of coffee to the next level with one of these! Put your cream in your cup first, froth it up, then add your coffee. It makes an average cup of coffee feel like it’s gourmet.
customer_reviews.author: Opinions from OH

customer_reviews.title: The paddle at the bottom is not nearly as effective ...
customer_reviews.text: The paddle at the bottom is not nearly as effective as the whisks which are more common. However, it has a far more powerful motor than most handheld stirrers, and is far easier to clean. The stand is attractive and convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Most batteries means most power and best frother by far.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that Bonjour is only cordless mixer with four batteries means that it has the most power. Only problem is that you must insert batteries correctly or it won't work so be super careful in studying the battery direction
customer_reviews.author: Codfish

customer_reviews.title: Came in broken
customer_reviews.text: Waited till my new kitchen was done, went to use it and the the metal blade was broken off in the box. Its been 31 days since order and you can't even return a broken product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Great for mixing tea, coffee, eggs, whip cream, etc!
customer_reviews.text: Had an old one before that looked like brushed aluminum of stainless steel. This one is just a metallic plastic/gray color. Still kind of looks metal but can definitely see the difference when next to each other. It's keeping 5 stars though because it works just as well for mixing everything we need it to and comes with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Juggernaut

customer_reviews.title: My BF has one and it's awesome, which made me want one
customer_reviews.text: Guess I have to drink more protein to get big enough muscles to push the button. Takes two hands to push button down. I'll be returning this. My BF has one and it's awesome, which made me want one.
customer_reviews.author: Supernurse

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to use - had to push too hard without good results . I used one my mother has that was tremendous which is why I hunted this one down. Hers was older & better.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: If you need a heavy duty frother, this is for you at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty frother. I tested its claim in making whipped cream from the heavy cream. It works!
customer_reviews.author: C Maese

customer_reviews.title: Both have broken within the first 10 uses!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first posted what a great frother this was gave it five stars i actually bought another one for my neighbor. After just a few uses the wheel has broke off on both units rendering them useless.
customer_reviews.author: jeff potvin

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This frother is very nice looking and very strong.be aware not to have running before putting it into the liquid.4 aa batteries.great kitchen tool.will mix just about any liquid you want to mix.
customer_reviews.author: danny lopez

customer_reviews.title: worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The button that turns it on is very ergonomic for someone who has arthritis like me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lund

customer_reviews.title: The blending disc came off on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the product because blending disc would come off. I haven't used the new one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia in Avl

customer_reviews.title: Making really good hot chocolate from scratch is a breeze with this
customer_reviews.text: This is real dynamo. I use it more for mixing rather than frothing. It will mix anything! Making really good hot chocolate from scratch is a breeze with this. You can even put some froth on the top if you wish. We love the appearance of the unit and the stand as well, so much so that we often leave on the counter in plain view, only putting it away when the cleaning people are coming.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: Tried the frothing thing last year with the cheaper $5 wire whip. Made that work for the better part of a year, but very inconsistent power. Bought this for my wife for Christmas, and yesterday the cheapie version finally quit, so I pulled this out as an early christmas present. Was amazed at how much more powerful this was compared to the Ikea version. Highly recommended. Of course, no idea how well it will hold up but I think the holder will help maintain it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rylaarsdam

customer_reviews.title: Creamy salad dressing helper.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for many years and it finally refused to function -- I decided to replace it as it is very useful to make creamy salad dressings and such: very powerful and the rotary blade is preferable from the curled wire ones that are great to foam hot milk.
customer_reviews.author: Katinka

customer_reviews.title: Bon Jour Frother
customer_reviews.text: The end of this product, the end that twirls and makes the froth, broke off within 3 weeks of using it. It's a piece of junk don't purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Froths milk, and stirs much more.
customer_reviews.text: In addition to frothing milk for lattes, we use it to stir up instant soup mixes. So long as the stirring shaft is straight and true, it performs well for quite a while before the battery runs down too much to spin stably. All-in-all, we are very satisfied, and often order it as a gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schoenwald

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't work, Amazon is always good about return and replacement. This is the first item I have ever had to return to Amazon. They sent a replacement right away. The second one worked well the first time, but after that I couldn't turn it off. Had enough when a week later it came on all by it self. It's time to return again. Will try one more time but will look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: VMH

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power but mixing blade became a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the product but the metal blender blade must have bent as it just doesn't work well any more, it does a lot of vibrating without getting much mixing results.
customer_reviews.author: roy w weiser

customer_reviews.title: Defective Switch
customer_reviews.text: Used a dozen times over two months and then the switch quit working. Terrible workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Easy blender
customer_reviews.text: We have looked everywhere for this style of simple blender/frother. It is lightweight and smaller than those sold in various stores. Easy to clean, uses a battery and we were glad to find it!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Don’t choke on the frothing disk when it breaks off
customer_reviews.text: I loved using this in my morning coffee for about a month before the frother disk came off into my coffee and I couldn’t put it back on. I think it was defective
customer_reviews.author: kelly k

customer_reviews.title: made whisking eggs very easy. The stand feel like its good quality too
customer_reviews.text: Huge time saver in the kitchen, made whisking eggs very easy. The stand feel like its good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: scotty williams

customer_reviews.title: Product showed up with a minorly bent spendel and the rubber grip looks damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up with a minorly bent spendel and the rubber grip looks damaged. Spins fast though, but
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great frother - for only 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the BonJour Frother several times a day for a month and it works beautifully. Easy to operate and easy to clean. Unfortunately, the frother fell off this evening. As much as I love using it, not sure I want to order another if it only lasts for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Gives you frothy milk in 15 sec. You must heat your cappuccino afterwards in the microwave but that 's OK. This small hand held model allows for precision frothing as holding the frother near the surface of the milk does the best. Originally I used alkaline AA batteries but they lasted two weeks. I then bought some Duracell Staycharged batteries and It was over 7 weeks before I had to recharge them. They are the best AA batteries I have ever bought. No real need to get the Frother on a recharger.
customer_reviews.author: James V. Bronke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the blender. Works better than deferent brand (4)
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this one
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on the 11th and today is the 24th, the bottom disc that does the frothing fell off into my coffee cup. Very disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: priss

customer_reviews.title: Prefer Original BonJour Frother
customer_reviews.text: It's the only battery operated frother that I've found that's powerful enough to mix a protein powder drink (it has four instead of two AA batteries). I found the stand to be superfluous (I tossed it), but would like to have a cover for the mixing blade (like the earlier BonJour frother). I could then toss it into a drawer without fear of the blade being bent.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: It works, it really works!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my purchase of the BonJour Barista Milk Frother. The frother is easy to operate and it does exactly what it's supposed to do. I use it to beat egg whites into cocktails, and in a matter of seconds it creates a uniform and high froth that would take no less than 1 minute by hard shake. Not to mention that when one shakes egg whites there is great potential for splash and sticky mess all over yourself. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Broke on very first use. I bought to replace an old Bon Jour Whisk which I have used for many years. The disk fell off very first time frothing milk. Poor workmanship with poorly made press metal fit.
customer_reviews.author: S Baca

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in Oct 2017 to replace an older ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Oct 2017 to replace an older version of it that I had for many years. I use the new one occasionally and now the flange at the bottom just fell off during normal usage. I will need to contact them now about product warranty. What a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product quality
customer_reviews.text: 1) Broken tip on arrival on first order. 2) Replaced with a second unit which also had a broken tip. 3) Second unit also had bad bearings in motor not allowing it to spin efficiently at correct speed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Frother!
customer_reviews.text: I love this powerful little frother. Works perfect and clean up is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Best frother ever!
customer_reviews.text: One small problem, being as my wife and I have arthritis it requires that we have to push the power button with a bit more strength than we have in our hands.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Same as 7025 Caffe Froth Turbo
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the Caffe Froth Turbo, this is their latest version of that wonderful mini-mixer. Even the people at BonJour didn't know this! I gave it a try based on the picture and I'm glad I did! Forget any "frother" with the whisk-like tip, those don't work! This is the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: cindig

customer_reviews.title: keep it below level of liquid
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for blending eggs with water and oil for baked goods. Makes a wonderful dressing for Ensalata Caprese. Making pudding from mix is fun and makes the pudding nice and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: William D Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent handheld Frother
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace same brand I purchased many years ago. Used it for frothing milk. Love it for for blending marinade ingredients and salad dressings. My original one used 4 batteries vs 2 on many frothers. It has good spead and power
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Connors

customer_reviews.title: Great for mixing 'Fiber" drinks.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little "frother". The switch is a little "finikey" but it is exactly what I was looking for. I'm older and was looking for something to mix fiber in water and this does it better than ever could have hoped. I have only had it for a week but if the switch holds up, it could be a 10 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Child

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job but have to bend the shaft as it gets to wobbling at times. Satisfied but could use stability improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Joeak

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Sent it back. Did not work. The unit did not froth milk. It needs a different head on the end of the frother to work. Liked the overall design but the head of the frother scratched and scared my cup and did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was voted by Better Homes and Gardens as the BEST tested and sorry to say...it does NOT froth milk at all due to the bottom shape of the wisker. The ones w/a SPRING are the ones that work really really well. I'm returning this. Was a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: POSEY

customer_reviews.title: we've had two of these and the motor went bad on both after less than a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Get a Nespresso Aeroccino Plus, you'll never go back to a hand held frother afterwards. This hand works well, quick duty, we've had two of these and the motor went bad on both after less than a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: David Wong

customer_reviews.title: NOT A BLENDER
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a blender. It's a milk frother. Very low speed/ power.
customer_reviews.author: 3M!LY W0LK3N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Greek Frappe
customer_reviews.text: Great milk frother. I have three of these. This is the best one to make Greek Frappe (iced coffee). Much more powerful than any other ones I have tried and I have probably tried 10 of the more popular ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I got one for myself and really liked it so I got one for my mom. She dropped it once (from the stand) and the disk at the bottom fell off! She put it back on and it stayed for a little while but kept falling off - she had to fix it with epoxy.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Landau

customer_reviews.title: I bought product back in may. been fighting with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought product back in may . been fighting with frother wheel to stay on . motor also died . product not worth the money stay away
customer_reviews.author: Chuckaroo

customer_reviews.title: It’s a mixer not a frothee
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t make a good froth compared to a coiled bottom. It makes a good mini mixer, but as a froth maker it’s horrible
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one - the first one lasted for years of daily use. So glad they still make these!
customer_reviews.author: Wick

customer_reviews.title: Hard to push button, don't think it will last
customer_reviews.text: Technically, this product is working fine. But the button is very hard to push. Also, if you don't push the button hard enough it goes on half way and wobbles a lot. It doesn't feel like it will last forever, but maybe I'll be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for this product for a while and tried something different but it just didn't have enough power to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Luetta Cross

customer_reviews.title: Mixing Tip Not Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Fell off the counter and end broke off. Did not snap back on. Ordered another product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has the best power of any frother
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a broken "French Cafe Frother." Uses four AAA batteries. Has the best power of any frother. Uses a good stirrer rather than the wire loops.
customer_reviews.author: gibbsak

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, works well. I have an older model of this same brand that I have had for several years and use frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Joey44

customer_reviews.title: kool tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: works awsum.. nice tool to have.. this little tool does allot more than just froth the milk (alothough that was the reason why i bought it.) the kids use it to make chocolate milk and have fun doing it..
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Percoco

customer_reviews.title: bonjour not work
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked . It will not turn on. Please tell me how to recover my money on my credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carter

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The product is extremely powerful and the best to make frappe. The difference in power between this and a standard frother is like night and day. The battery compartment is the worst, getting the batteries right and closing it properly is very challenging.
customer_reviews.author: MT Miami

customer_reviews.title: portable barista-like milk foamer
customer_reviews.text: It makes the tight milk foam as if I was @ Starbucks. Excellent choice for inexpensive solution for cafe au lait or lattes at home.
customer_reviews.author: JacoTacoCat

customer_reviews.title: Frothed milk without steam
customer_reviews.text: Although you have to heat the milk separately, this produces the same results as a steamer. Cleaning up afterward is as easy as a quick rinse. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design
customer_reviews.text: Unit is well made and stylish. With a longer stem, then others I've used in the past, it makes it easy to even mix a tall protein drink. I only wish the stand at the base was more stable. With four batteries it is plenty strong for most jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is time to give up on Bonjour
customer_reviews.text: I had BonJour's basic frother which I liked a lot. One day it just died on me after only a few months of use. I decided to give them the benefit of the doubt and try another one of their products. I bought this new and improved version of their frother. It literally worked for 5 seconds. It started spinning and then just went dead. Can't bring it back to life. Two defective products in 2 weeks? That is just poor quality. I'll never buy anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: B-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and powerful little mixer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and powerful little mixer. Definitely not a frother like those nasty little things with the spring on them but if you want to incorporate air you certainly can and you'll end up with a creamier dense foam. Also damned powerful as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT! I first purchased the rechargeable one and it lasted about 3 months. This one is loads better!
customer_reviews.author: James W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Froths a great latte
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Had one that broke, so backed off a star in the review, but got another one. It takes seconds, easy clean and pop it back in the stand. I think the 4 batteries give it good power.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Au Revoir to BonJour Frother?
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my frother for Christmas. However, within the first month, it fell over in the stand on the counter. The top part sealing in the batteries became separated, and the frother 'wheel' at the bottom fell off. I put it back together, but now I always have to hold it together when I use it. This morning I lost the wheel (again) in my coffee cup. I am disappointed because it seemed so heavy duty and powerful. The frothing part works well if I hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: 2girls2dogs

customer_reviews.title: The best frother hands down
customer_reviews.text: This frother is the best! After going through the two battery models each year we switched to the BonJour 4-battery model and couldn't be happier. This seller is top notch. We will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The power button did not work after 1-2 days making it inoperable. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Frother, Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived yesterday, earlier than expected and we've used it several times already and love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Belgard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The prior reviews I read made me think this frother would be great. However, I have been very disappointed with the froth produced and holding the power button down the entire time is quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: DoRaMe

customer_reviews.title: I love lattes and used a round spring shaped one previously
customer_reviews.text: I love lattes and used a round spring shaped one previously. I bought this one thinking it was the same. It is a wavy disk instead. It doesn't create a great froth only marginal. It cost 4 times more. I ended up buying another spring one. It may not be as pretty or have a stand but it froths.
customer_reviews.author: susan tadlock

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek update to the old version
customer_reviews.text: Nice sleek update to the old version. Love this for making small amounts of whipped cream, beating eggs for omelette and other small amounts of stuff you don't want to pull out the electric mixer for.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Does exactly what it says it does and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Less than overjoyed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bonjour Frother that I have purchased. The first was an older model which I thoroughly enjoyed but eventually it wore out and needed to be replaced. The quality of this new frother is not nearly as good as the first one. The motor works well but the shaft is not true and the spinner tends to wobble. The manufacturers quality control department needs a bit of help.
customer_reviews.author: Oris B. Houglum

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great frother, and the stand is invaluable. It keeps the frother off the counter where it is exposed to germs and water. Back to the frother, it works very well. Froths the milk right up in the mug, pour in the coffee, and you have your cappuccino right now. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Careyon

customer_reviews.title: Frother
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I use it everyday. Years ago my mom gave me one of these, it finally wore out. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't froth the milk
customer_reviews.text: It's an well built, attractive product but doesn't whip the milk. Instead of a whip on the end it's a disk that just mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Northside 415

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy as with my previous bonjour frother
customer_reviews.text: My previous frother fell into the disposal and broke. I was eager to buy another Bonjour model. Although this froths as well as the previous one, I find it is rather difficult to operate. One has to really press down hard on the push button to keep the motor going. Even the slighest change in pressure stops the motor. I find this really annoying and am debating if I will write Bonjour to complain about this defect.
customer_reviews.author: Janet O'Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Top will not stay on
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers here, I too can verify that the top will not stay on because the springs are so tight. If they fixed this design flaw, it would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: LONG-LASTING!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model that lasted 8 years so it was logical to buy another one of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

product_meta.title: BonJour Battery-Powered Cafe Latte Frother with Stand, Chrome/Black
product_meta.description: In just seconds, Bonjour's automatic frothers produce rich creamy froth for your favorite coffee drinks. This battery operated frother whips milk into thick foam in seconds for creating a latte, cappuccino or macchiato. It's also handy for sauces, hot chocolate, foamy cocktails and even scrambles eggs. The soft-touch push button and chrome stand make this easy to use and store. Gray with black trim and push button, powered by 4 AA batteries.
feature_bullets: More powerful, battery operated automatic frother produces rich, creamy froth in seconds
Perfect for cappuccinos, lattes and mochas; blade design can even scramble eggs and mix dressings
Features a soft-touch push down button, grip and chrome stand; easy to use and convenient to store
Chrome with black trim and push button

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars316 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
